dependabot graph -f input.yml --local . --updater-image ghcr.io/dependabot/dependabot-updater-silent
stdout 'create_dependency_submission'

-- manifest.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.3" }
}

-- foo/manifest.json --
{
  "dependency-b": { "version": "1.2.3" }
}

-- input.yml --
command: graph
job:
  package-manager: "silent"
  source:
    directories:
    - "/"
    - "/foo"
    provider: example
    hostname: 127.0.0.1
    api-endpoint: http://127.0.0.1/api/v3
    repo: dependabot/smoke-tests
    branch: "main"
